details.ptt_disclaimer: PTT reviews are from the NTHU_Course board and are not moderated by NTHUMods. The reviews do not represent the views of NTHUMods. If you find any inappropriate content, please report to the board itself.

DownloadTimetableDialog.title: Download Your Timetable
DownloadTimetableDialog.description: You can download the calendar file (.ics) and import it to your calendar app, or download the image!
DownloadTimetableDialog.success_description: The timetable image has been downloaded to your device. Please check your browser's download folder or click the image to copy to clipboard.
DownloadTimetableDialog.download_error_description: Failed to generate the image. Please try again or contact support.

ShareSyncTimetableDialog.title: Share & Sync Your Timetable
ShareSyncTimetableDialog.description: Send this link to your friends to share your timetable or to yourself to keep your timetable synced on all devices.

DateContributeForm.title: Contribute Dates
DateContributeForm.description: Contribute important dates to the course
DateContributeForm.disclaimer: Your submission will contain your Student ID, and will be auditable on request.
DateContributeForm.accurate_relavent: Enter only accurate and relavent information!

intro.title: Welcome to NTHUMODS
intro.description: NTHUMODS might just be your ultimate companion for academic success at National Tsing Hua University! Here's a quick guide to get you started.

courses.title: Explore Courses
courses.description: Discover a wide range of courses tailored to your academic journey. From core subjects to electives, NTHUMODS has you covered. Dive in and find the perfect fit for your schedule.

dashboard.title: Personalized Dashboard
dashboard.description: Your personalized dashboard awaits! Track your courses, assignments (coming soon), and exams (coming soon) all in one place. Stay organized, stay on top.

bus.title: Bus Schedules
bus.description: Navigating NTHU's campus is a breeze with access to bus routes, timings, and stops to plan your daily commute efficiently. No more waiting in uncertainty.

tools.title: Need more features?
tools.description: Link your NTHU account to NTHUMODS and open the door to a treasure trove of additional tools. Seamlessly integrate your academic life by accessing exclusive features tailored to NTHU students.

dev.title: Growing together
dev.description: We're committed to continuous improvement to offer you the best possible experience. Please note that the app is still in development, and while we strive for perfection, there may be occasional hiccups along the way. We value your input extremely, share your ideas, feedback, and features you'd love to see.

login.title: Proxy Login With NTHU AIS Account
login.disclaimer: Note: Your credentials will only be stored on your device, and will only be transmitted to the server for authentication.
login.description: For every action that requires authenticated data from NTHU AIS, the website will send your credentials to the server for authentication by our web scrapers. The tranmission is protected by HTTPS encryption, and your credentials is never stored on our servers.
login.agree: I've read the privacy policy, and understand the terms of proxy login.

errors.CaptchaError: CAPTCHA Decoding went wrong, Please retry in 15 minutes.
errors.UnknownError: Something went wrong, please try checking on the NTHU AIS website.

ccxp.logging_in_please_wait: Logging into your Academic Information System Account...

sponsorship.title: Supported by
sponsorship.description: Contribute as little as $1 to support our development

contribute.title: Contributors & Contributing
contribute.subtitle: Help us build better academic tools for the NTHU community. Every contribution makes a difference.

sponsors.title: Our Amazing Sponsors
sponsors.description: We're grateful for the incredible support from our sponsors who make NTHUMods possible!

how_to_contribute.title: How You Can Contribute
how_to_contribute.description: NTHUMods is a 100% student-led, open source project. We rely on the support of our contributors and the NTHU community to keep this platform alive and thriving. Every contribution, no matter how small, makes a real difference in the lives of thousands of students!

financial_support.title: ðŸ’° Financial Support
financial_support.description: Help us cover development costs, and other expenses. Every dollar helps us maintain and improve the platform for all students.

feedback.title: Share your feedback
feedback.description: We are always open for feedback! If you have any suggestions, ideas, or feedback, or you think this particular shade of purple looks ugly! Let us know using the links below.

bug_reports.title: File Bug Reports and Feature Requests
bug_reports.description: Found a bug? Want to see a new feature? File an issue on our GitHub repository!

code_design.title: Contribute Code and Design
code_design.description: Ready to dive in? We welcome contributors of all skill levels! Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting out, there's something for everyone. Check out our good first issues to get started, and join our community discussions!

call_to_action.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
call_to_action.description: Join our vibrant community of students, developers, and dreamers who are building the future of academic tools at NTHU!
